name: Xié'è Zhīzǐ
overview: The Son of Evil is an RPG launched with the Super A'Can and intended to be its flagship title. It plays in a manner similar to popular JRPGs like Final Fantasy IV but with more emphasis on personal choice. The player has branching dialogue paths with even trivial NPCs as well as in more plot critical moments which can change events in the game and even make the protagonist good or evil.
